name: Impossible Game
description:
This is my first game i made it with Unity it went wrong but i decided to leave it like this. Its a bit hard to play beacause of controls.

!!!IF U DONT WANT SPOILERS DO NOT READ THIS!!!:

Controls: A- forwards

                      D-Bacwards

                      W-Right

                       S-Left

                                                                          Good luck!

   Ps: i put the price of the donation 1$ beacause mabey someone will acctualy donate some money. I havent made any money online considering this is my first game.
